mapper.select: SELECT dept_cd, col_cd, flct_no, dept_nm, dept_telno, dept_otl, dept_goal FROM department WHERE dept_cd = #{deptCd}
select a.s||LPAD(a.e + 1,3,'0') as nextCode from ( select SUBSTR(max(dept_cd),0,4) as s, SUBSTR(max(dept_cd),-3) as e from department) a

SELECT sub_no ,b.dept_nm ,sub_nm ,sub_grade ,sub_hour ,sub_crd ,c.com_cd_nm ,sub_otl FROM subject a INNER JOIN department b ON(a.dept_cd=b.dept_cd) INNER JOIN com_code c ON(a.crs_classf_cd=c.com_cd) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY 1
select a.s||LPAD(a.e + 1,3,'0') as nextCode from ( select SUBSTR(max(sub_no),0,3) as s, SUBSTR(max(sub_no),-3) as e from subject) a
SELECT sub_no ,dept_cd ,sub_nm ,sub_grade ,sub_hour ,sub_crd ,crs_classf_cd ,sub_otl FROM subject WHERE sub_no = #{subNo}

/* kr.or.hku.admin.mapper.AcademicMapper.getAcademicAplyList */ SELECT change_no AS change_no , ac.std_no AS std_no , s.std_nm AS std_nm , c1.com_cd_nm AS change_type_cd , change_rsn AS change_rsn , change_aply_dt AS change_aply_dt , change_start_yr AS change_start_yr , change_start_sem AS change_start_sem , change_end_yr AS change_end_yr , change_end_sem AS change_end_sem , c2.com_cd_nm AS aprv_stts_cd , change_rjct_rsn AS change_rjct_rsn FROM ACADEMIC_CHANGE ac INNER JOIN student s ON ac.std_no = s.std_no INNER JOIN com_code c1 ON ac.change_type_cd = c1.com_cd INNER JOIN com_code c2 ON ac.aprv_stts_cd = c2.com_cd ORDER BY change_no DESC
